mapper.sql: a.ID_TABLE AS tableId , a.ID_MODEL AS modelId , model.MODEL_NAME AS modelName , a.REPOSITORY_NAME AS repositoryName , a.ID_DATABASE AS databaseId , a.SCHEMA_NAME AS schemaName , a.TABLE_NAME AS tableName , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
LEFT JOIN MDM_MODEL model ON model.ID_MODEL = a.ID_MODEL
mapper.select:
select
from MDM_TABLE a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND a.ID_MODEL = #{modelId}
AND a.TABLE_NAME like '%${tableName}%'
